alert.note: Alert for Cabell; Jackson; Kanawha; Mason; Putnam; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 1:16AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Meigs, southeastern Gallia, Mason, northeastern Cabell, northwestern Kanawha, Putnam, west central Roane and Jackson Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 115 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ravenswood to 8 miles east of Point Pleasant to 9 miles south of Rio Grande. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gallipolis, Ripley, Winfield, Hurricane, Ravenswood, Sissonville, Milton, Eleanor, Buffalo, Poca, Sandyville, Culloden, Kenna, Teays Valley, Cross Lanes, Bancroft, Crown City, Leon, Portland and Statts Mills. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 111 and 151. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 24 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cabell; Jackson; Kanawha; Mason; Putnam; Roane
